item.title: Serverless To-Do app with Nuxt, LocalForage and Pinia
item.description: In this project a proof of concept of a basic task application has been developed with the following technologies: Nuxt3 Pinia LocalForage Bun has also been used for the management of the libraries and the execution of the development environment.
item.content:encoded:
In this project a proof of concept of a basic task application has been developed with the following technologies:

  • Nuxt3
  • Pinia
  • LocalForage

Bun has also been used for the management of the libraries and the execution of the development environment.
